title: HTTP Log Middleware Config
description: Configuration for the HTTP logging middleware plugin

endpoint.description: URL to send log entries to (e.g., https://logs.example.com/ingest)

timeout_ms.description: Timeout in milliseconds for the log HTTP call

content_type.description: Content-Type header for the log request

include_headers.description: Include request and response headers in the log entry

include_body.description: Include request and response body size in the log entry

custom_fields.description: Static custom fields to include in every log entry
